description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
full_summary:
# Parts Buy for ScannX Processor for Supply to National Defence

The Department of National Defence has announced a Request for Proposal ([eng] Request for Proposal; [fra] Demande de propositions) procurement to purchase various parts to support the ScannX Processor [eng] Radiographic equipment; [fra] Matériel radiographique. The part requirements are detailed below:

* 11 x PROTECTOR, PLATE, IMA units [eng] Unit of Issue: EA; [fra] Quantité: 11; Unité de distribution: CHACUN EA) to be delivered to the Defence National Depot, 25 C.F.S.D. Montreal 
* 35 x HOLDER, PLATE, IMAGING, RADIATION units [eng] Unit of Issue: EA; [fra] Quantité: 35; Unité de distribution: CHACUN EA) to be delivered to the Defence National Depot, 25 C.F.S.D. Montreal
* 39 x PLATE, IMAGING, RADIATION units [eng] Unit of Issue: EA; [fra] Quantité: 39; Unité de distribution: EA) to be delivered to the 7 C.F.S.D. Edmonton Depot
* 3 x SHIPPING AND STORAGE CONTAINER, MISCELLANEOUS EQUIPMENT units [eng] Unit of Issue: EA; [fra] Quantité: 3; Unité de distribution: EA) to be delivered to the 7 C.F.S.D. Edmonton Depot

Bidders must submit a proposal indicating if they wish to propose an equivalent or substitute product. The following information must be provided:

* Brand name and model 
* Part Number 
* NCAGE 

The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: cb-5706-71505816
* **Solicitation Number**: W8486-238936/A
* **Publication Date**: 2023-05-23
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-07-07T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence
